action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
NFIP Extension Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes the National Flood Insurance Program through September 30, 2023.
The bill shall take effect as if it had been enacted on September 30, 2022, the date the program is set to expire under current law.
